name: Blackholes
description:
Harness the power of Blackholes to swing canisters through the air to a designated depositor! 

Instructions:

Use the edit menu to place blackholes on the screen, click and drag them where you desire and use the edit menu to alter the blackholes different attributes. Strength pulls objects hard but increases the size of the deathzone! Size will make it bigger, and falloff makes the Strength attribute less strong the further away from the center the object is. There may be redzones in the edit mode where you can't place blackholes. If you hear an error sound while trying to press play, you have a misplaced blackhole!

When placing blackholes, you will get a preview of the canisters being ejected, when you are ready press play to make the attempt. If you need to replace your holes, just press edit again. You win by achieving the first listed objective, but go for gold and get the budget bonus objective too!

Enjoy this fun, puzzle game submitted to the Brackeys 2020.1 Game Jam!

Please leave your thoughts in the comments, I'd love to hear how you enjoyed the game, as I wanna make a post jam patch!
